mapper.select: SELECT a.*,t.`tag_name`,t.`id` AS tid,u.`nickname`,c.`cate_name` FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_tags ats ON a.`id`=ats.`aid` LEFT JOIN tags t ON ats.`tid`=t.`id` LEFT JOIN user u ON a.`uid`=u.`id` LEFT JOIN category c ON a.`cid`=c.`id` WHERE a.id=#{aid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pv(count_date,pv,uid) SELECT CURRENT_DATE(),totalPv - pv,t.`uid` FROM pvview p,totalpvview t WHERE p.`uid`=t.`uid`
mapper.select: SELECT count_date from pv WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER by count_date limit 7
